article.title: Boeing to Produce Jet Distributed Targeting Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The Boeing Company, St. Louis, Missouri, is being awarded a $12,037,926 firm-fixed-price delivery order against a previously issued basic ordering agreement for the low-rate initial production of 26 Distributed Targeting Systems and supporting equipment/documentation for the F/A-18E/F and EA-18G aircraft. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
